name: Spark Seed
description: Warm, curious prompts to open up a two-player conversation.

cards.text: Share one word that describes your week so far.
What song would you start this session with?
Pick an emoji for your mood right now and explain why.
What is one lesson you keep relearning?
Share a small win from the past month.
What habit has quietly helped you the most this year?
If you had an extra free hour daily, how would you spend it?
Would you rather explore the deep sea or outer space together?
If you could borrow a skill for a day, what would it be?
Name something small you appreciate but rarely mention.
Who helped you recently and how?
What is a routine you are grateful for?
What is one thing you want to try together this season?
What are you looking forward to in the next 30 days?
If we set a mini-challenge for next week, what would it be?
Make up a two-line story together, one line each.
Swap phones and take a single photo that captures the vibe right now.
Teach me a tiny trick or shortcut you use all the time.
